msbt.message: Guess what! I've decided what I wanna do with my life!I'm gonna be A SUPERHERO!
Hey, if you're ever in danger, yell <10_10 />"Help me, Bagel Boy Jr.!"<10_9 /> I'll be there to save you real fast!Faster if I already have my tights on!
I wanna be a superhero that can fly! If there's somebody who needs saving, I'll swoop right in!And if nobody's in trouble, I'll zoom around doing airplane noises! Zzzzzrrroooom! Nnnyyyrooom!
I've got, basically, no fashion sense? But if I wear a cape and some bright-colored undies I'll be a superhero! Lookout, evil! Here comes <10_10 />BAGEL BOY JR.!<10_9 />
There's a thing I've been collecting for a while now In secret It's mysecret collection.

Ready for this? I collect Blibliblib That's a drum roll noise Anyway! I collecteraser dust!Anytime I erase a thing? I save the dust. I've got a few jars full now! They're real fun to smell.I smell 'em and I think "these were ideas I hadand now those ideas are dust."

I've been collectingcollectibles! Everything in the world is a collectible, if ya think about it!Toysbugscomic books old candy wrapperstoe nails It's all limited edition!Pretty soon, I'm gonna have to start collecting places to put my collections!

I've been keeping any spare socks that I find. Find in the wild, I mean. I'm talking outdoors, yeah?Ya find 'em everywhere if ya look hard enough!Not too sure what to do with 'em, and I've only found twobut I'll think of something.
Hey, can I talk to you? I've got a real serious problemI can't get any sleep lately, unless I've got some lights on.

If I hear a spooky noise at night I get all freaked out!Without a light on, I can't see what made the noise!But I'm too scared to walk across a dark room to turn on a light!And if I DID turn on the light, I might see the thing that made the noise! And that could be even scarier!It's a real conumdrumble!
What if a ghost started to tickle me in the dark?!I don't LIKE being tickled by ghosts!

What if a vampire shark was sneakin' around my house in the dark?Ya can't see vampire sharks in the dark! Ya can't hear 'em in the dark!In the dark, ya can't even prove they're real! And if they're not real Thenwhat am I scared of?<10_10 />NOTHING MAKES SENSE IN THE DARK!
I saw a cloud that looked like a yummybutteryflakynummy flakybutteryyum-yum croissant.I wish I hadn't been so hungry when I saw that cloud. I stared at it for so longmy real croissant got cold!

I can't wait until I finally figure out how to fly! I know ya gotta flap real hard to take offBut I dunno if I got the stuff ya need to flap, if you're gonna flap.I guess it's like Grandpa always says, "Just keep tryin'! You'll wear yourself out eventually!"

If there's one thing I wanna learn how to doit's fly!It must be real tough or everybody'd be doing it all the time.But being a psycomuhcologimist is real tough too! And Grandma learned how to do that, soI just gotta be like her and try real hard! Pretty soon, I'll be flying all over the place!Zzzzzrrroooom! "Hi Grandma!" Nnnyyyrooom!!
There's nothing so yummy as a nice, fresh .
are yummy on their own, but they're even yummier when ya cook 'em!I bet it's because the cook throws some love in with the !Or maybe they just add a buncha sugar.
Sometimes, when I'm sad, smelling some good smells makes everything all better.Sometimes I'll tape to my face! I can walk around happy, even on the rainiest days!
I had a dream all the disappeared from the islandAnd everybody blamed me for eating all of them!I woke up real freaked out! Oh! And my bed? It was fulla !<10_4 /> Dunndunn<10_10 />DUNNN<10_9 />!
I'm starting to get into exercise!

I invented this new technique where I just crouch down and then stand up again. It's sooooo hard!All I need now is a name You just squat down to do itso I think I'll call it the "leggy-bendy exercise!"
My new routine is to bend at the waist, spread my arms, and puff out my chest. Hwaaaaah!Pro tip—don't do it after eating a bunch of or your belly will go SLORSH and feel ooky
The thing I've been really into is just moving my arms and legs and body around to music. It might look like regular dancing, but it's exercise! I call it -ercise!
So, whatcha do is just lift one arm up and stretch it waaaaay over to the side.It hurts REAL bad, but that's how you get super-stretchy arms, right? Like in the comics?
